reasoning: Mixed anxiety-depression disorder or comorbid anxiety/depression. Incidence approximately 3,500 new diagnoses per 100k person-years. Prevalence estimated 28% of global population (28,000 per 100k) have anxiety or depression, with significant overlap/comorbidity. Estimates based on WHO and epidemiological studies, though heterogeneous definitions of 'anxiety-depression comorbidity'.
source: WHO Global Health Estimates and epidemiological meta-analyses
